Posts.Title: Tiny Hard Frozen Peas! Cmromasanta MTwoman

Posts.Content: Cmromasanta wrote: Hi everyone! I recently found what felt like a frozen pea or tiny hard bb right behind my areola. When I press down on my areola I can feel it. Now it feel like there is 3 of them there all different sizes yet still hard like frozen peas. They are all right next to each other. Has anyone had any experience like this? Any similar types of lumps that fit this description? I have been a nervous wreck for two weeks now! I have an appt tomorrow for a diagnostic mammogram and an ultrasound. I have no other symptoms just these tiny hard lumps. it's hard to tell if they move. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Tiny Hard Frozen Peas! Cmromasanta MTwoman

Posts.Content: Nov 11, 2017 01:45PM Cmromasanta wrote: Hi yes I have had a mammo before. I hope was hoping to find someone with a similar experience. I had a 3D mammo and ultrasound done and was told that the hard pea size lumps were cysts. Because I have such dense breast I hope they didn't miss anything. Call me paranoid but there is one that is really small and hard that just feels different to me.
